name: Ocean Rescue (XthunderX640)
description:
Drive a boat and collect as much trash as you can in 2 minutes. The only problem is. You only have one button that you can press. That is the 'Space' button.

Assets Used:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/sea/polygrunt-low-poly-boat-17...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/lowpoly-water-1075...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/trash-low-poly-cartoon-pack-66229
